name: Ext_R5_MedicationAdministration_occurence
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationAdministration.occurence[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.occurence[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)
element.definition: A specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place). For many administrations, such as swallowing a tablet the use of dateTime is more appropriate.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.effective[x]` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.effective[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)
element.definition: A specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place). For many administrations, such as swallowing a tablet the use of dateTime is more appropriate.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.effective[x]` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.effective[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
